description:
go.exp/locale/collate: changed maketables.go to make use of new cldr
package.  This fixes several bugs in tables.go and chars.go that were
related to not correctly handling LDML inheritance.

messages.text:
Hello r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.exp/

LGTM (although a little more function-level commentary wouldn't hurt)
of course we need to land the CLDR package first.

updated comments for the altInclude function at least.


On Tue, Mar 19, 2013 at 7:29 PM, <r@golang.org> wrote:

> LGTM (although a little more function-level commentary wouldn't hurt)
> of course we need to land the CLDR package first.
>
> https://codereview.appspot.**com/7904043/<https://codereview.appspot.com/7904043/>
>



-- 
Trying this for a while: http://go/OnlyCheckEmailTwiceADay.
Marcel van Lohuizen -- Google Switzerland GmbH -- Identifikationsnummer:
CH-020.4.028.116-1

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2d7795660ea0&repo=exp ***

go.exp/locale/collate: changed maketables.go to make use of new cldr
package.  This fixes several bugs in tables.go and chars.go that were
related to not correctly handling LDML inheritance.

R=r, mpvl
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7904043
